headline.main: Lepchenko Upsets Top-Seeded Wozniacki at Stanford
headline.print_headline: Lepchenko Upsets Top-Seeded Wozniacki at Stanford

docs.snippet: American Varvara Lepchenko beat top-seeded Caroline Wozniacki 6-4, 6-2 in the second round of the Bank of the West Classic on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: American Varvara Lepchenko beat top-seeded Caroline Wozniacki 6-4, 6-2 in the second round of the Bank of the West Classic on Thursday night.

headline.main: Judge: Fine Cabbie $25,000 for Turning Away Black Passengers
headline.print_headline: Judge: Fine Cabbie $25,000 for Turning Away Black Passengers

docs.snippet: A taxi driver may have to pay $25,000 after a judge said the cabbie refused to pick up passengers because they're black, passing them over for white riders while they watched....
docs.lead_paragraph: A taxi driver may have to pay $25,000 after a judge said the cabbie refused to pick up passengers because they're black, passing them over for white riders while they watched.

docs.lead_paragraph: Brad Dalke and Elizabeth Wang won playoffs Thursday in the Junior PGA Championship at Miramont Country Club.

headline.main: Police Say Truck Bomb in Kabul Kills 7 People, Wounds 400
headline.print_headline: Police Say Truck Bomb in Kabul Kills 7 People, Wounds 400

docs.snippet: A bomb hidden in a truck exploded in the center of the Afghan capital, killing seven people and wounding about 400, police and health officials said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A bomb hidden in a truck exploded in the center of the Afghan capital, killing seven people and wounding about 400, police and health officials said Friday.

headline.main: Grand Jury Indicts Wyoming Man Arrested in Roadside Killings
headline.print_headline: Grand Jury Indicts Wyoming Man Arrested in Roadside Killings

docs.snippet: A federal grand jury indicted a Wyoming man Thursday on murder and assault charges in the fatal roadside shooting of a Montana man and his wife on the Crow Indian Reservation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal grand jury indicted a Wyoming man Thursday on murder and assault charges in the fatal roadside shooting of a Montana man and his wife on the Crow Indian Reservation.

headline.main: NY Workers Building Altar, Lectern for Pope Francis' Visit
headline.print_headline: NY Workers Building Altar, Lectern for Pope Francis' Visit

docs.snippet: Carpenter Hector Rojas tried to explain the emotion behind cutting, sanding and assembling a wooden chair that Pope Francis will use during a Mass at Madison Square Garden in his first U.S. visit....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carpenter Hector Rojas tried to explain the emotion behind cutting, sanding and assembling a wooden chair that Pope Francis will use during a Mass at Madison Square Garden in his first U.S. visit.
